text: void addUp ( int * a , int j ) ; int max ( int a , int b ) ; int main ( ) { int t , n ; int i , j , k ; int sum_max ; int * a ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < t ; i ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; int num = ( ( n * ( n + 1 ) ) / 2 ) ; a = ( int * ) malloc ( num * sizeof ( int ) ) ; for ( j = 0 ; j < num ; j ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , a + j ) ; } for ( j = n - 2 ; j >= 0 ; j -- ) { addUp ( a , j ) ; } printf ( "%d\n" , * a ) ; free ( a ) ; } } void addUp ( int * a , int j ) { int i ; int upperOffset = ( j * ( j + 1 ) ) / 2 ; int lowerOffset = ( ( j + 1 ) * ( j + 2 ) ) / 2 ; for ( i = 0 ; i < j + 1 ; i ++ ) { * ( a + upperOffset + i ) += max ( * ( a + lowerOffset + i ) , * ( a + lowerOffset + i + 1 ) ) ; } } int max ( int a , int b ) { return ( a > b ? a : b ) ; }
